mapper.select: SELECT PHOTO as photo , USERCODE as code , ID as id , Name as name , NICKNAME as nickName , GENDER as gender , BIRTHDAY as birthday , PHONE as tel , EMAIL as email , ADDR1 as addr1 , ADDR2 as addr2 , ADDR3 as addr3 , ADDRCD1 as addrCd1 , ADDRCD2 as addrCd2 , ADDRCD3 as addrCd3 , ADDR_DETAIL as addrDetail , REVIEW as rate , POINT as point , GRADE as grade FROM VIEW_OWN_INFO WHERE USERCODE = #{code}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_NOTI WHERE USER_CD = #{code} AND OPEN_DATE IS NULL

SELECT NOTE_CD as noteCd , SENDER as userCd , RECEIVER as userCd2 , CONTENT as content , S_DEL_DATE as sDelDate , R_DEL_DATE as rDelDate , OPEN_DATE as openDate , INS_DATE as insDate , NICKNAME as nickName , SUBSTR(CONTENT,1,40) as title FROM VIEW_R_NOTE_LIST WHERE RECEIVER = #{code} ORDER BY INS_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTE(NOTE_CD, USER_CD, USER_CD2, CONTENT) VALUES('NOTE'||SEQ_NOTE.NEXTVAL, #{userCd}, #{userCd2}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM as rowN , FUNC_WALK_RECEIVE_LAST_CD(DWALK) AS walkCd2 , WALK_CD as walkCd , NICKNAME as nickName , AGE as age , TYPE as gender , WALK_DATE as walkDate , START_TIME as startTime , END_TIME as endTime , ADDR as addrDetail , PET_NAME as petName , DOG_ITEM as dogType , PET_GENDER as petGender , INS_DATE as insDate FROM VIEW_WALK_RECEIVE_INFO WHERE ME = #{ownCd} AND FUNC_WALK_RECEIVE_LAST_CD(DWALK) = -1 ORDER BY ROWN DESC

SELECT WALK_CD as walkCd , OWN_CD as ownCd , PHOTO as photo , NICKNAME as nickName , AGE as age , TYPE as gender , ITEM as intr , INTR_DETAIL as intrDetail , OWN_AVG as fdbAvg , PETCOUNT as petCount , RECENT_WALK_DATE as lastWalk , INS_DATE as insDate FROM VIEW_WALK_RECEIVE_DETAIL_OWN WHERE WALK_CD = #{walkCd}

SELECT WALK_CD as walkCd , PET_CD as petCd , PHOTO as photo , GD as goodDog , MDHEAD as mdHead , MDBODY as mdBody , PETNAME as petName , NAME as dogItem , BIRTH as petBirthday , GENDER as petGender , NEUTRAL as neutralDate , PET_SIZE as petSize FROM VIEW_WALK_RECEIVE_DETAIL_PET WHERE WALK_CD = #{walkCd}

SELECT FI.ITEM as itemName , FDB.SCORE as itemScore FROM TBL_OWN_FDB FDB JOIN TBL_OWN_FDB_ITEM FI ON FDB.OWN_FDB_ITEM_CD = FI.OWN_FDB_ITEM_CD JOIN TBL_WALK_LAST WL ON FDB.WALK_LAST_CD = WL.WALK_LAST_CD WHERE OWN_CD2 = ( SELECT W.OWN_CD FROM TBL_WALK W JOIN TBL_OWN O ON W.OWN_CD = O.OWN_CD WHERE WALK_CD = #{walkCd}) AND OWN_CD = #{ownCd} AND FDB.INS_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(INS_DATE) FROM TBL_OWN_FDB WHERE OWN_CD2 = ( SELECT W.OWN_CD FROM TBL_WALK W JOIN TBL_OWN O ON W.OWN_CD = O.OWN_CD WHERE WALK_CD = #{walkCd}) AND OWN_CD = #{ownCd})

SELECT ROWNUM as rowN , WALK_CD as walkCd , OWN_CD as ownCd , NICKNAME as nickName , AGE as age , TYPE as gender , WALK_DATE as walkDate , START_TIME as startTime , END_TIME as endTime , ADDR as addrDetail , PET_NAME as petName , NAME as dogType , PET_GENDER as petGender , INS_DATE as insDate FROM VIEW_WALK_SEND_INFO WHERE ME = #{ownCd} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT WALK_CD as walkCd , OWN_CD as ownCd , PHOTO as photo , NICKNAME as nickName , AGE as age , TYPE as gender , INTR as intr , INTRDETAIL as intrDetail , OWN_AVG as fdbAvg , PETCOUNT as petCount , RECENT_WALK_DATE as lastWalk , INS_DATE as insDate FROM VIEW_WALK_SEND_DETAIL_OWN WHERE WALK_CD = #{walkCd} AND ME = #{ownCd}

SELECT ROWNUM AS rowN , WALKLASTCD , WALKCD2 , OWNCD2 , WALKCD , OWNCD , ADDR1CD , ADDR1 , ADDR2CD , ADDR2 , ADDR3CD , ADDR3 , ADDRDETAIL , WALKDATE , STARTTIME , ENDTIME , NICKNAME , AGE , PHOTO , GENDER , INTR , INTRDETAIL , FUNC_GET_USER_CD(OWNCD) AS USERCD1 , FUNC_GET_USER_CD(OWNCD2) AS USERCD2 , (CASE WHEN TO_DATE(WALKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= SYSDATE THEN '산책대기' WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(WALKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) > 0 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(WALKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) <=7 AND FUN_WALK_FDB_COUNT(WALKLASTCD, OWNCD2) IS NULL THEN '피드백하기' WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(WALKDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) >=7 AND FUN_WALK_FDB_COUNT(WALKLASTCD, OWNCD2) IS NOT NULL THEN '산책완료' ELSE '산책대기' END ) AS STATUS FROM ( SELECT * FROM VIEW_WALK_LAST_FIR WHERE OWNCD = FUNC_GET_OWN_CD(#{userCd})
UNION
SELECT * FROM VIEW_WALK_LAST_SEC WHERE OWNCD2 = FUNC_GET_OWN_CD(#{userCd}) ) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT WALK_PET_SEL_CD AS walkPetSel, WALK_CD AS walkCd, PET_CD AS petCd , PHOTO AS petPhoto, NAME AS petName, BIRTH AS petBirthday, NEUTRAL AS neutralDate , DOGI_CD AS dogItemCd, DOGI AS dogItem, PET_SIZE AS petSize , MDHEAD AS mdHead, MDBODY AS mdBody, GOODDOG AS goodDog , GENDER AS petGender FROM VIEW_WALK_LAST_PET_DETAIL WHERE WALK_CD = FUNC_GET_OTHER_WALK_CD(#{userCd}, #{walkLastCd})

SELECT V.PET_CD AS petCd, V.NAME AS petName, D.NAME AS disaName FROM VIEW_WALK_LAST_PET_DETAIL V ,TBL_DISA D WHERE V.PET_CD = D.PET_CD(+) AND WALK_CD = FUNC_GET_OTHER_WALK_CD(#{userCd}, #{walkLastCd})

SELECT V.PET_CD AS petCd, V.NAME AS petName, A.NAME AS allergeName FROM VIEW_WALK_LAST_PET_DETAIL V, TBL_ALLERGE A WHERE V.PET_CD = A.PET_CD(+) AND WALK_CD = FUNC_GET_OTHER_WALK_CD(#{userCd}, #{walkLastCd})

SELECT FI.ITEM as ownFdbItem , FDB.SCORE as ownFdbScore FROM TBL_OWN_FDB FDB JOIN TBL_OWN_FDB_ITEM FI ON FDB.OWN_FDB_ITEM_CD = FI.OWN_FDB_ITEM_CD JOIN TBL_WALK_LAST WL ON FDB.WALK_LAST_CD = WL.WALK_LAST_CD WHERE OWN_CD2 = FUNC_GET_OTHER_OWN_CD(#{userCd},#{walkLastCd}) AND OWN_CD = FUNC_GET_OWN_CD(#{userCd}) AND FDB.INS_DATE = (SELECT MAX(INS_DATE) FROM TBL_OWN_FDB WHERE OWN_CD2 = FUNC_GET_OTHER_OWN_CD(#{userCd},#{walkLastCd}) AND OWN_CD = FUNC_GET_OWN_CD(#{userCd}))
{ CALL PRC_WL_INSERT(#{walkCd}, #{weatherCd} ) }

SELECT ROWNUM as rowN , AGC_SEL_CD as agcCd , NAME as petName , WALK_DATE as walkDate , START_TIME as startTime , END_TIME as endTime , ADDR as addrDetail , WOK_NAME as name , AGE as age , GENDER as gender FROM VIEW_AGC_WOK_INFO WHERE OWN_CD = #{ownCd} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT UD.PHOTO as photo , UD.NAME as name , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY')) + 1 as age , GT.TYPE as gender , FUNC_WOK_FDB_AVG(W.WOK_CD) as fdbAvg , FUNC_WOK_FDB_COUNT(W.WOK_CD) as fdbCount , TO_CHAR(FUNC_AGC_LAST_DATE(W.WOK_CD), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as lastWalk FROM TBL_WOK W JOIN TBL_WOK_APPLY WL ON W.WOK_APPLY_CD = WL.WOK_APPLY_CD JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON WL.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD JOIN TBL_GENDER_TYPE GT ON UD.GENDER_TYPE_CD = GT.GENDER_TYPE_CD WHERE W.WOK_CD = #{wokCd}

SELECT DT.TYPE as dogType , MNUI.NAME || ' ' || MNI.NAME as mdHead , FUNC_GOOD_DOG(P.PET_CD) as goodDog , P.NAME as petName , FUN_PET_WEIGHT(P.PET_CD) as weight FROM TBL_AGC_PET_SEL APS JOIN TBL_PET P ON APS.PET_CD = P.PET_CD JOIN TBL_DOG_TYPE DT ON APS.DOG_TYPE_CD = DT.DOG_TYPE_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_MEDAL_GET MG ON P.PET_CD = MG.PET_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_MEDAL_NUM_ITEM MNUI ON MG.MD_NUM_ITEM_CD = MNUI.MD_NUM_ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_MEDAL_NAME_ITEM MNI ON MG.MD_NAME_ITEM_CD = MNI.MD_NAME_ITEM_CD WHERE (MG.MD_TYPE_CD = 'MT1' OR MG.MD_TYPE_CD IS NULL) AND AGC_CD = #{agcCd}

SELECT WFI.ITEM as itemName , WF.SCORE as itemScore FROM TBL_WOK_FDB WF JOIN TBL_WOK_FDB_ITEM WFI ON WF.WOK_FDB_ITEM_CD = WFI.WOK_FDB_ITEM_CD JOIN TBL_AGC_LAST AL ON WF.AGC_LAST_CD = AL.AGC_LAST_CD JOIN TBL_AGC_SEL AGS ON AL.AGC_SEL_CD = AGS.AGC_SEL_CD JOIN TBL_AGC A ON AGS.AGC_CD = A.AGC_CD WHERE AGS.WOK_CD = #{wokCd} AND WF.INS_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(WF.INS_DATE) FROM TBL_WOK_FDB WF JOIN TBL_AGC_LAST AL ON WF.AGC_LAST_CD = AL.AGC_LAST_CD JOIN TBL_AGC_SEL AGS ON AL.AGC_SEL_CD = AGS.AGC_SEL_CD JOIN TBL_AGC A ON AGS.AGC_CD = A.AGC_CD WHERE AGS.WOK_CD = #{wokCd} AND A.OWN_CD = #{ownCd} )

SELECT ROWNUM as rowN , AGC_CD as agcCd , NAME as petName , WALK_DATE as walkDate , START_TIME as startTime , END_TIME as endTime , ADDR as addrDetail , INS_DATE as insDate FROM VIEW_AGC_APPLY_INFO WHERE OWN_CD = #{ownCd} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as walkDate , TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as startTime , TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as endTime , ASD.ITEM || ' ' || ASGG.ITEM || ' ' || ADEM.ITEM || ' ' || A.ADDR_DETAIL as addrDetail , TO_CHAR(A.INS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as insDate FROM TBL_AGC A JOIN TBL_ADDR_D_E_M ADEM ON A.ADDR_D_E_M_CD = ADEM.ADDR_D_E_M_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_G_G ASGG ON ADEM.ADDR_S_G_G_CD = ASGG.ADDR_S_G_G_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_D ASD ON ASGG.ADDR_S_D_CD = ASD.ADDR_S_D_CD WHERE A.AGC_CD = #{agcCd}

SELECT ROWNUM as rowN , AL.AGC_LAST_CD as walkLastCd , AGS.AGC_SEL_CD as agcCd , P.NAME petName , TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as walkDate , TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as startTime , TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as endTime , UD.NAME as name , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY')) + 1 as age , GT.TYPE as gender , AL.PRICE as price , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as lastWalk FROM TBL_AGC_LAST AL JOIN TBL_AGC_SEL AGS ON AL.AGC_SEL_CD = AGS.AGC_SEL_CD JOIN TBL_AGC A ON AGS.AGC_CD = A.AGC_CD JOIN TBL_WOK W ON AGS.WOK_CD = W.WOK_CD JOIN TBL_WOK_APPLY WA ON W.WOK_APPLY_CD = WA.WOK_APPLY_CD JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON WA.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD JOIN TBL_GENDER_TYPE GT ON UD.GENDER_TYPE_CD = GT.GENDER_TYPE_CD JOIN TBL_AGC_PET_SEL APS ON A.AGC_CD = APS.AGC_CD JOIN TBL_PET P ON APS.PET_CD = P.PET_CD WHERE APS.DOG_TYPE_CD = 'DT1' AND A.OWN_CD = #{ownCd} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
{ CALL PRC_OWN_REF_INSERT(#{agcCd} ) }
SELECT ROWNUM as rowN , REC_CD as recCd , ITEM as item , TITLE as title , NAME as name , INS_DATE as insDate FROM VIEW_REC_LIST WHERE USER_CD = #{userCd} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT S.SCH_CD as schCd , V.REC_CD as recCd , V.SCH_ITEM_CD as schItemCd , V.ITEM as item , W.ITEM as weather , TO_CHAR(S.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as schDate , TO_CHAR(S.START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as startTime , TO_CHAR(S.END_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as endTime , ASD.ITEM || ' ' || ASGG.ITEM || ' ' || ADEM.ITEM || ' ' || S.ADDR_DETAIL as addr , S.TITLE as title , V.USER_CD as userCd , V.NAME as name , V.INS_DATE as insDate , V.CONTENT as content FROM TBL_SCH S JOIN TBL_SCH_ITEM SI ON S.SCH_ITEM_CD = SI.SCH_ITEM_CD JOIN TBL_WEATHER W ON S.WEATHER_CD = W.WEATHER_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_D_E_M ADEM ON S.ADDR_D_E_M_CD = ADEM.ADDR_D_E_M_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_G_G ASGG ON ADEM.ADDR_S_G_G_CD = ASGG.ADDR_S_G_G_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_D ASD ON ASGG.ADDR_S_D_CD = ASD.ADDR_S_D_CD JOIN TBL_ACC A ON S.SCH_CD = A.SCH_CD JOIN VIEW_REC_LIST V ON A.ACC_CD = V.ACC_CD WHERE V.REC_CD = #{recCd}

SELECT AT.ITEM as item , AI.CONTENT as content , AI.PRICE as price FROM VIEW_REC_LIST V JOIN TBL_ACC A ON V.ACC_CD = A.ACC_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_ACC_INFO AI ON A.ACC_CD = AI.ACC_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_ACC_TYPE AT ON AI.ACC_TYPE_CD = AT.ACC_TYPE_CD WHERE V.REC_CD = #{recCd}
SELECT WEATHER_CD AS WEATHERCD, ITEM AS WEATHER FROM TBL_WEATHER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SCH(SCH_CD, OWN_CD, SCH_ITEM_CD, WEATHER_CD, ADDR_D_E_M_CD, ADDR_DETAIL, START_DATE, END_DATE, USER_CD, TITLE) VALUES ('SCH'||SEQ_SCH.NEXTVAL, FUNC_GET_OWNER_CD(#{userCd}), #{schCd} , #{weatherCd}, #{addrSel3Cd}, #{address} , TO_DATE(#{startDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(#{endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{userCd}, #{title} )
mapper.select: SELECT SCH_ITEM_CD as schCd , ITEM as title FROM TBL_SCH_ITEM WHERE ITEM != '대행' AND ITEM != '그룹'

SELECT S.SCH_CD as schCd, SI.ITEM as item, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(S.START_DATE, 'DD')) AS schDate FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_OWN O ON U.USER_CD = O.USER_CD JOIN TBL_SCH S ON O.OWN_CD = S.OWN_CD JOIN TBL_SCH_ITEM SI ON S.SCH_ITEM_CD = SI.SCH_ITEM_CD WHERE U.USER_CD = #{code} AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{walkDate} ORDER BY START_DATE

SELECT TO_CHAR(S.START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS startTime, TO_CHAR(S.END_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS endTime, S.TITLE AS title, S.ADDR_DETAIL AS addrDetail, SI.ITEM AS item, A.ACC_CD AS code, S.SCH_CD AS schCd FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_OWN O ON U.USER_CD = O.USER_CD JOIN TBL_SCH S ON O.OWN_CD = S.OWN_CD JOIN TBL_SCH_ITEM SI ON S.SCH_ITEM_CD = SI.SCH_ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_ACC A ON S.SCH_CD = A.SCH_CD WHERE U.USER_CD = #{code} AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{walkDate} AND (S.SCH_ITEM_CD = 'SCHI1' OR S.SCH_ITEM_CD = 'SCHI4' OR S.SCH_ITEM_CD = 'SCHI5' OR S.SCH_ITEM_CD = 'SCHI6' OR S.SCH_ITEM_CD = 'SCHI7' OR S.SCH_ITEM_CD = 'SCHI8')
